thread.title: Rouhani says Iran wants constructive relations with the world

title: Rouhani says Iran wants constructive relations with the world
text:
Rouhani says Iran wants constructive relations with the world 8:16am EDT - 00:36
President Rouhani says Iran can build relations with the world whether there are sanctions in place or not, ahead of U.S. President Trump's decision on whether to withdraw from the nuclear deal. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
President Rouhani says Iran can build relations with the world whether there are sanctions in place or not, ahead of U.S. President Trump's decision on whether to withdraw from the nuclear deal.
